text: Samuel McClain (April 15, 1943 - June 16, 2015), better known by his stage name Mighty Sam McClain, was an American soul blues singer and songwriter. He began his career in 1958. He was nominated for a Grammy Award. He was born in Monroe, Louisiana. McClain died from a stroke on June 16, 2015 in Concord, New Hampshire, aged 72. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1943 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American blues musicians Category:American R&B; singers Category:American singer-songwriters Category:American soul musicians Category:American blues singers Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Disease- related deaths in New Hampshire Category:Singers from Louisiana
title: Mighty Sam McClain
